question: [Focus] Dansk: Angiv which category has the highest bar fra sojlediagrammet.

qas.question: [Focus] Dansk: Angiv which category has the highest bar fra sojlediagrammet.
[Rapid] Francais: Donnez which category has the lowest bar depuis le diagramme en barres.
[Study] English: Tell what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars from the bar chart.
